name: MANipulation (Waygone, Katandand...)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

The human mods and robot parts EVIL CO  has been making  lately, have been damaging and killing people!

You are our only hope to save the rest of us, you can defeat their workers, and only you can defeat our worst enemy, the HUMAN ROBOT, upgrade your body with mods and powerups, get to the top floor, and be sure to DESTROY IT COMPLETELY.

FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED

CONTROLS:

Movement: W-A-S-D

Shoot: Left Click

Dash: Space

Switch Weapon: Mouse wheel, Q-E

Kick: Z
